name: The Haunting of Dr. Phil | Mini Jam 117
name_original: The Haunting of Dr. Phil | Mini Jam 117
description:
The Haunting of Dr. Phil | Mini Jam 117

This was made for the 117th mini jam game jam. The games a lot of nonsense but I had a great time making it. It stems off of my fear of eshays. The story is pretty basic. Your a ghost of the minion Kevin and Dr. Phil is an eshay that is trying to open up all the windows in your house which is letting out all the cold air. This will kill you if the temperature gets to cold.
